overview: Not again. Cheating with a babysitter ruined his first marriage and here Dave is again buried balls deep in trouble again. But how could he help it? Megan was the sweetest little thing he had ever laid his eyes on. And Megan? He promised her she could drive his Mercedes. It's a win win situation.  Little Kat has decided to experiment with Satanism. You know how kids are. They're extremely influential. Especially when an older man seems to know what he's talking about and walking with a hard on. What girl wouldn't like that?
tagline: Crazy little cunts! They'll do anything!
title: The Babysitter 19
